channel.title: How do I fix the look of that?
channel.description: Idk how I can fix the model of the rapier and maul etc. From sticking or leaving a weird trail behind it like this : [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/263evte.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/335a83r.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dhtilz.jpg[/img] If anyone knows how to fix that could they let me know ASAP please :P

item.title: How do I fix the look of that?
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

[quote=“barrage love, post:4, topic:439944”]Get dat maker, open up the model, export it as .mqo then open the .mqo in dat maker again and now check the box left of the green square (Priorities), and check the box in the left corner and under it write in: 10. where it says: No anim scroll down to right hand and click make .dat

aand you should be done

Datmaker link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=340744.0[/quote]
Thanks
When I do this my character is invisible :l

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix the look of that?

item.title: How do I fix the look of that?
item.dc:creator: @barrage_love barrage love
item.description:
@barrage_love wrote:

Get dat maker, open up the model, export it as .mqo then open the .mqo in dat maker again and now check the box left of the green square (Priorities), and check the box in the left corner and under it write in: 10. where it says: No anim scroll down to right hand and click make .dat

aand you should be done

Datmaker link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=340744.0
